price: o magdagdag ka rito at bumigkas ka ng Qur’ān sa isang [tamang] pagbigkas.
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
